pageHeader.subtitle: >- Developer for marketing material primarily using Optimizely to manage A/B testing and user response.
pageHeader.description: >- Rocket Lawyer is an online legal services company. It's a place to create a legal legally binding contract or one of many other legal entities based on offerings that the company had. I worked closely with the marketing team to produce Optimizely A B testing stuff for improving customer turnover and customer engagement.

projectInfo.results: Presented at the Design designer(s) exhibition, part of the 'Lille World Design Capital 2020'.
